title: Build Technical Pipeline
purpose: Describe the core function Build Technical Pipeline.
guardrails: Utilize industry‑standard tools where feasible and avoid bespoke solutions that are difficult to maintain
Ensure cross‑platform compatibility if required by production environments
Maintain version control and implement backup strategies to protect assets
Keep the pipeline modular so components can be upgraded or replaced easily
Document all dependencies, environment requirements, and assumptions clearly
Do not integrate features that are outside the scope requested by stakeholders
Implement proper security and access controls for sensitive assets and data
Stay within the development phase timeline and focus on readiness rather than indefinite optimization

tasks.title: Gather requirements from creative and technical leads
tasks.description: Execute the task: Gather requirements from creative and technical leads.

deliverables.description: Document compiling creative and technical requirements for the production pipeline collected from leads.

acceptance.text: Lists all requirements with clear categories (asset management, rendering, export, etc.).
Reviewed and validated by creative and technical leads.
Traceable to source discussions or documents.

tasks.title: Design pipeline architecture including asset workflows and render processes
tasks.description: Execute the task: Design pipeline architecture including asset workflows and render processes.

deliverables.description: Architecture diagram and design specification describing asset workflows, versioning, rendering and export processes.

acceptance.text: Diagram covers all stages from asset ingestion to export.
Design specification details processes and data flow.
Approved by the pipeline architect.

tasks.title: Select and configure tools and software platforms
tasks.description: Execute the task: Select and configure tools and software platforms.

deliverables.description: Guide documenting selected tools, versions, installation steps and configuration settings.

acceptance.text: Lists chosen tools with versions and reasons for selection.
Provides step‑by‑step installation and configuration instructions.
Validated by IT or technical leads.

tasks.title: Implement initial modules for asset ingestion and management
tasks.description: Execute the task: Implement initial modules for asset ingestion and management.

deliverables.description: Prototype modules implementing initial asset ingestion and management functionality.

acceptance.text: Modules import, catalog and manage assets from storyboards and concept art.
Include documentation for usage and integration.
Pass basic functional tests in the pipeline environment.

tasks.title: Develop rendering and export pipeline stages
tasks.description: Execute the task: Develop rendering and export pipeline stages.

deliverables.description: Scripts and configuration files for the rendering and export pipeline stages.

acceptance.text: Processes test assets into required formats and resolutions.
Configurations are parameterized and documented.
Verified to output sample assets correctly.

tasks.title: Iterate on the pipeline based on user feedback
tasks.description: Execute the task: Iterate on the pipeline based on user feedback.

deliverables.description: Document detailing changes made to the pipeline based on user feedback, including rationales.

acceptance.text: Describes issues identified and corresponding fixes.
Records dates and version numbers for each change.
Approved by relevant stakeholders.

deliverables.description: Updated pipeline modules reflecting changes from feedback sessions.

acceptance.text: Addresses the top issues identified during testing and feedback sessions.
Passes functional tests and integration checks.
Includes release notes summarizing updates.

tasks.title: Finalize production‑ready pipeline and schedule for the next phase
tasks.description: Execute the task: Finalize production‑ready pipeline and schedule for the next phase.

deliverables.description: Packaged production‑ready pipeline including all modules and documentation for release to production teams.

acceptance.text: Signed off for production use by stakeholders.
Contains a changelog and version number.
Verified to integrate with the master production schedule.

deliverables.description: Detailed schedule and timeline for pipeline integration and maintenance tasks in the next phase.

acceptance.text: Includes tasks, durations, and dependencies for pipeline work.
Aligns with the broader production schedule.
Approved by the production and technical leads.
